description: Using the machine's local time, [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658) waits 43200 seconds (12 hours) from the initial creation timestamp of a specific file, .report. After the elapsed time, [XCSSET](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0658) executes additional modules.(Citation: trendmicro xcsset xcode project 2020)

external_references.description: Mac Threat Response, Mobile Research Team. (2020, August 13). The XCSSET Malware: Inserts Malicious Code Into Xcode Projects, Performs UXSS Backdoor Planting in Safari, and Leverages Two Zero-day Exploits. Retrieved October 5, 2021.
